blogPost.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
blogPost.body: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
blogPost.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing
blogPost.author: Notty

localize.description: 它非常简单和简约，但它工作。这是一个显示现在要采取的行动的小部件应用程序。推荐给智能手机上瘾者。它是一个生产力的工具，但我建议写下你现在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一个鼓励你做一件事的iOS小工具

localize.description: 它非常簡單和簡約，但它工作。這是一個顯示現在要採取的行動的小部件應用程序。推薦給智能手機上癮者。它是一個生產力的工具，但我建議寫下你現在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一個鼓勵你做一件事的iOS小工具
